title: Helium-3 Reactor Test Complete
body: The Helium-3 prototype reactor aboard Olympus Base achieved sustained ignition. Power output exceeded projections by 12%.

title: Phobos Elevator Stability Test
body: Tether oscillation tests for the Phobos orbital elevator passed Phase 3 parameters. Deployment planned for Q4.

title: AI Rover 'ARGO' Discovers Ice Vein
body: Autonomous Rover ARGO mapped a subglacial ice deposit under Elysium Planitia. Estimated reserves: 18,000 mÂ³.
